metadata.key_specifications: Single 2-input OR gate, wide supply voltage range 2.0 V to 5.5 V, overvoltage tolerant inputs up to 5.5 V, high noise immunity, low power CMOS, ESD protection up to 2000 V HBM and 1000 V CDM, temperature range -40°C to +125°C

page_summaries.content:
The 74AHC1G32; 74AHCT1G32 is a single 2-input OR gate. Inputs are overvoltage tolerant. This feature allows the use of these devices as translators in mixed voltage environments.

• Wide supply voltage range from 2.0 V to 5.5 V
• Overvoltage tolerant inputs to 5.5 V
• High noise immunity
• CMOS low power dissipation
• Latch-up performance exceeds 100 mA per JESD 78 Class II Level A
• Symmetrical output impedance
• Balanced propagation delays
• Input levels:
    • For 74AHC1G32: CMOS level
    • For 74AHCT1G32: TTL level
• ESD protection:
    • HBM: ANSI/ESDA/JEDEC JS-001 class 2 exceeds 2000 V
    • CDM: ANSI/ESDA/JEDEC JS-002 class C3 exceeds 1000 V
• Specified from -40 °C to +125 °C

Table 5. Limiting values
In accordance with the Absolute Maximum Rating System (IEC 60134).

Symbol	Parameter	Conditions	Min	Max	Unit
VCC	supply voltage		-0.5	+7.0	V
VI	input voltage		-0.5	+7.0	V
IIK	input clamping current	VI < -0.5 V	-20	-	mA
IOK	output clamping current	VO < -0.5 V or VO > VCC + 0.5 V [1]	-	±20	mA
IO	output current	-0.5 V < VO < VCC + 0.5 V	-	±25	mA
ICC	supply current		-	75	mA
IGND	ground current	-75	-	mA
Tstg	storage temperature		-65	+150	°C
Ptot	total power dissipation	Tamb = -40 °C to +125 °C [2]	-	250	mW

[1] The input and output voltage ratings may be exceeded if the input and output current ratings are observed.
[2] For SOT353-1 (TSSOP5) package: Ptot derates linearly with 3.3 mW/K above 74 °C.
    For SOT753 (SC-74A) package: Ptot derates linearly with 3.8 mW/K above 85 °C.
    For SOT8065-1 (XSON5) package: Ptot derates linearly with 3.2 mW/K above 72 °C.

Product Summary.content: The 74AHC1G32; 74AHCT1G32 is a single 2-input OR gate. It is a CMOS low power dissipation device with wide supply voltage range from 2.0 V to 5.5 V and overvoltage tolerant inputs to 5.5 V for use in mixed voltage environments.

Key features include high noise immunity, latch-up performance exceeding 100 mA per JESD 78 Class II Level A, symmetrical output impedance, balanced propagation delays, and ESD protection (HBM: ANSI/ESDA/JEDEC JS-001 class 2 exceeds 2000 V, CDM: ANSI/ESDA/JEDEC JS-002 class C3 exceeds 1000 V).
The 74AHC1G32 has CMOS level inputs while the 74AHCT1G32 has TTL level inputs. The device is specified from -40°C to +125°C temperature range.

Electrical Characteristics.content: Table 5 presents the limiting values or absolute maximum ratings for various electrical parameters of the device, in accordance with the Absolute Maximum Rating System (IEC 60134). These ratings specify the maximum allowable values for supply voltage (VCC), input voltage (VI), input clamping current (IIK), output clamping current (IOK), output current (IO), supply current (ICC), ground current (IGND), storage temperature (Tstg), and total power dissipation (Ptot).

The input and output voltage ratings may be exceeded if the input and output current ratings are observed. The total power dissipation (Ptot) derates linearly with temperature above a certain threshold, which varies depending on the package type: 3.3 mW/K above 74°C for SOT353-1 (TSSOP5) package, 3.8 mW/K above 85°C for SOT753 (SC-74A) package, and 3.2 mW/K above 72°C for SOT8065-1 (XSON5) package.

The table provides the minimum and maximum values for each parameter, along with any specific conditions or notes. For example, the supply voltage (VCC) and input voltage (VI) must be between -0.5 V and +7.0 V, the input clamping current (IIK) must not exceed -20 mA when the input voltage is below -0.5 V, and the output clamping current (IOK) must not exceed ±20 mA when the output voltage is below -0.5 V or above VCC + 0.5 V.

Packaging Information.content: Fig. 6. Package outline SOT353-1 (TSSOP5) - This chunk provides information about the package outline and type for the TSSOP5 package, which is a thin shrink small outline package with 5 leads.
Fig. 7. Package outline SOT753 (SC-74A) - This chunk describes the package outline for the SC-74A package, which is a small outline transistor package with a compact footprint.

Fig. 8. Package outline SOT8065-1 (XSON5) - This chunk details the package outline for the XSON5 package, which is an extremely small outline non-leaded package with 5 terminals, suitable for space-constrained applications.
Package types: TSSOP5, SC-74A, XSON5 - This chunk summarizes the different package types mentioned in the text, including their respective package codes and lead counts.

Packaging information, package outlines, package types, lead counts - This chunk provides a high-level overview of the content, which covers various aspects of packaging information, such as package outlines, package types, and lead counts for different package configurations.
